mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PW, name, phone, email) VALUES (#{ID},#{PW},#{name},#{phone},#{email})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from MEMBER WHERE ID=#{ID}
select * FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{ID} AND PW = #{PW}
select ID,PW,name,phone,email from MEMBER where ID = #{ID};
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PW=#{PW}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone} WHERE ID = #{ID};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{ID} AND PW=#{PW};
